info.value: With 25 years of building and scaling Enterprise and SaaS businesses, he now likes to work with young, ambitious entrepreneurs to help them get over the same humps that he crossed in his journey. He works with entrepreneurs in advisory, board, or even operational capacities, to link business strategy, customer success and technology delivery to create sales-driven, agile companies.  Gaurav is an angel investor  interested in both funding early stage opportunities, as well as providing mentoring and advice in any capacity to young companies. His interest areas lie in innovative cloud-based business models and products, mobile platforms, learning technologies as well as new ways of content consumption and utilization.
